クラス MagicSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • MagicSquare

  • public class MagicSquare
extends java.lang.Object
    The class MagicSquare n2 numbers from standard input and tests whether they form a magic square when put into matrix form.An n x n matrix that is filled with the whole numbers 1, 2, 3, ... n2 is a magic square if the sum of the elements in each row, in each column, and in the two diagonals is the same value.

        public static int[] getUserInputs(java.lang.String inputString)

        戻り値:

        public static java.lang.Boolean checkNumberOfInputs(int[] array)

        パラメータ:

        戻り値:
        if the length of array is n^2, return true. Otherwise false.

        パラメータ:

        戻り値:

      • checkSumOfRowsAreSame

        public static java.lang.Boolean checkSumOfRowsAreSame(int[] array)
        This method checks if the sum of rows are all same when int array are in the form of nxn matrics.
        パラメータ:
        array - int array
        戻り値:
        if the sum of rows are all same, return true. Otherwise false.
